Title: Thanksgiving
Writer: Sean Gray, Georgia Pritchett, Will Smith, Armando Iannucci (created by), Alexis Wilkinson (staff writer)
Actors: Julia Louis-Dreyfus, Anna Chlumsky, Tony Hale, Reid Scott
Plot: As Thanksgiving arrives, a new crisis hits the team, with Selina left unable to fulfill her duties. Meanwhile, Dan takes on a new role, and Jonah receives exciting news.
